scripts.docker:login: aws ecr-public get-login-password --region us-east-1 | docker login --username AWS --password-stdin public.ecr.aws/a4o9b2p8
scripts.gc:list:aws: docker run -w /app/output  --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output --env-file=aws.env grucloud/grucloud-cli --infra /app/iac_aws.js list --json gc-list.json --config /app/input/config_aws.js --graph --all --dot-file gc.dot
scripts.gc:info:azure: docker run --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output --env-file=azure.env grucloud/grucloud-cli --infra iac_azure.js  info --provider azure --config input/config_azure.js
scripts.gc:list:azure: docker run  -w /app/output --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output  --env-file=azure.env grucloud/grucloud-cli --infra /app/iac_azure.js list -p azure --config /app/input/config_azure.js --json gc-list.json --graph --all --dot-file gc.dot
scripts.gc:info:gcp: docker run --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output  grucloud/grucloud-cli --infra iac_google.js  info --provider google --config input/config_google.js
scripts.gc:list:gcp: docker run -w /app/output --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/input,target=/app/input --mount type=bind,source=$PWD/output,target=/app/output  grucloud/grucloud-cli --infra /app/iac_google.js list -p google --config /app/input/config_google.js --json gc-list.json --graph --all --dot-file gc.dot
